name: Drop World
description:
Hello, this is my first game created with gdevelop, music and  sound effects from opengameart.

Drop world is a platform game in which a small drop of water needs your help to survive in a small world full of dangers (maybe not many) to reach safety at the end of their little adventure.

Thank you for download and hope you enjoy it, i will try to create a version for linux and other levels or other game in the future.

¡Again thank you!
